snippet: The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration wants vehicles to be louder when going less than 18 miles per hour so cyclists and pedestrians can hear them better.
abstract: National Highway Traffic Safety Administration proposes rule for electric and hybrid vehicles to be louder when going less than 18 miles per hour so cyclists and pedestrians can hear them better.
lead_paragraph: The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration wants vehicles to be louder when going less than 18 miles per hour so cyclists and pedestrians can hear them better.

headline.main: Proposal for Noisier Electric Cars at Low Speed
headline.print_headline: Proposal for Noisier Electric Cars at Low Speed
